Posts.Content: My mom has Stage 3c breast cancer. Had mastectomy, radiotherapy, tamoxifen but told tamoxifen no longer working so taken off 2 months ago. Cancer spread down arm into hand, told inoperable. Now has chronic diahorrea every 2/3 nights. Whole bed affected, the 'night nappies' they give her are useless. Why can this not be treated? Been told 'this is part of your illness'. Can anyone suggest anything at all please ?
